title: 'Witches are trying to cast spells on Trump but can't...' Reddit thread viral
content: A report claimed that each month, thousands of American voters who are self-identified witches -- gather online and in person to prevent Donald Trump from winning the election. The anti-Trump "witches" use orange candles for their binding spell that aims to prevent Trump from doing any further harm., the report said.
summary: A report claimed that each month, thousands of American voters who are self-identified witches -- gather online and in person to prevent Donald Trump from winning the election. The anti-Trump "witches" use orange candles for their binding spell that aims to prevent Trump from doing any further harm., the report said.

title: After Springsteen and Eminem, Beyonce to perform in Harris's campaign rally
content: Pop icon Beyonce will perform at a rally for Vice President Kamala Harris in Houston. Harris is campaigning across the country before the election, focusing on key issues like abortion rights. The event in Texas coincides with a tight Senate race between Sen. Ted Cruz and Rep. Colin Allred.
summary: Pop icon Beyonce will perform at a rally for Vice President Kamala Harris in Houston. Harris is campaigning across the country before the election, focusing on key issues like abortion rights. The event in Texas coincides with a tight Senate race between Sen. Ted Cruz and Rep. Colin Allred.

title: Abhijit Banerjee among 23 economists who endorsed Kamala Harris over Donald Trump
content: Twenty-three Nobel Prize-winning economists endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for the US Presidential elections, citing her policies as offering stronger, more equitable economic growth compared to Trump's proposals, which are viewed as inflationary and deficit-increasing. Notable signatories include Joseph Stiglitz, Daron Acemoglu, and Abhijit Banerjee.
summary: Twenty-three Nobel Prize-winning economists endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for the US Presidential elections, citing her policies as offering stronger, more equitable economic growth compared to Trump's proposals, which are viewed as inflationary and deficit-increasing. Notable signatories include Joseph Stiglitz, Daron Acemoglu, and Abhijit Banerjee.

title: 'Slaps so hard I spin around': Doug Emhoff's ex-girlfriend speaks out about 2012 assault
content: “As I’m talking to him, Doug got out of the line, comes up, turns me around by my right shoulder. I’m completely caught off guard, I’m not bracing, I’m in four-inch heels, wearing a full-length gown and it’s between 2-3 a.m.,” Doug Emhoff's ex-girlfriend told the DailyMail. “He slaps me so hard I spin around, and I’m in utter shock.” Earlier, Doug's office denied the incident.
summary: “As I’m talking to him, Doug got out of the line, comes up, turns me around by my right shoulder. I’m completely caught off guard, I’m not bracing, I’m in four-inch heels, wearing a full-length gown and it’s between 2-3 a.m.,” Doug Emhoff's ex-girlfriend told the DailyMail. “He slaps me so hard I spin around, and I’m in utter shock.” Earlier, Doug's office denied the incident.

title: Elon Musk's dinner with Rupert Murdoch: 'He's doing for Trump what he did for Tesla'
content: ​Elon Musk Monday traveled from Pittsburgh to New York for a sinner with Rupert Murdoch and other business leaders to discuss the state of the race, a New York Times report said citing a person with knowledge of the meal. ​"In some ways, what Mr Musk has done for Tesla, the electric car company, is not terribly different from what he is doing now for Mr Trump," the NYT report noted.
summary: ​Elon Musk Monday traveled from Pittsburgh to New York for a sinner with Rupert Murdoch and other business leaders to discuss the state of the race, a New York Times report said citing a person with knowledge of the meal. ​"In some ways, what Mr Musk has done for Tesla, the electric car company, is not terribly different from what he is doing now for Mr Trump," the NYT report noted.

title: Boulevard of ‘brokenist’ dreams: Justin Trudeau’s tryst with parliamentary language
content: The term “brokenist” emerged during a heated session in which Justin Trudeau aimed to highlight the alleged negativity and obstructionism of the opposition, particularly the Conservative Party, under its leader Pierre Poilievre. Trudeau’s use of the term seemed to suggest that the opposition was overly focused on portraying Canada as “broken,” a theme Poilievre had used repeatedly in his critique of Trudeau’s government.
summary: The term “brokenist” emerged during a heated session in which Justin Trudeau aimed to highlight the alleged negativity and obstructionism of the opposition, particularly the Conservative Party, under its leader Pierre Poilievre. Trudeau’s use of the term seemed to suggest that the opposition was overly focused on portraying Canada as “broken,” a theme Poilievre had used repeatedly in his critique of Trudeau’s government.

title: Pro-Trump handles trend #KamalaGropedMeToo after Stacey Williams' allegations
content: The hashtag #KamalaGropedMeToo, trending among pro-Trump supporters, appears to be a disinformation campaign aimed at deflecting attention from new sexual misconduct allegations against Donald Trump. The trend uses baseless claims targeting Vice President Kamala Harris, attempting to discredit her and shift focus away from Trump’s legal troubles. This strategy exploits social media to spread false narratives, undermining both Harris and the broader #MeToo movement, while highlighting the challenges of combating disinformation in today’s political landscape.
summary: The hashtag #KamalaGropedMeToo, trending among pro-Trump supporters, appears to be a disinformation campaign aimed at deflecting attention from new sexual misconduct allegations against Donald Trump. The trend uses baseless claims targeting Vice President Kamala Harris, attempting to discredit her and shift focus away from Trump’s legal troubles. This strategy exploits social media to spread false narratives, undermining both Harris and the broader #MeToo movement, while highlighting the challenges of combating disinformation in today’s political landscape.

title: Can't be a coincidence that everyone hates Meghan Markle: Royal expert
content: Royal expert Hugo Vickers said Meghan's profile got a raise after marrying Prince Harry but Meghan was never particularly committed to becoming a member of the Royal Family. "It does seem to me that she wasn't particularly committed to being a member of the Royal Family. By marrying Prince Harry, her profile went up globally, enormously, and so people wanted to hear more about her, and to some extent more from her..." Vickers said.
summary: Royal expert Hugo Vickers said Meghan's profile got a raise after marrying Prince Harry but Meghan was never particularly committed to becoming a member of the Royal Family. "It does seem to me that she wasn't particularly committed to being a member of the Royal Family. By marrying Prince Harry, her profile went up globally, enormously, and so people wanted to hear more about her, and to some extent more from her..." Vickers said.

title: Amid groping allegation, Donald Trump's past comments about daughter Ivanka viral
content: ​“You know who’s one of the great beauties of the world, according to everybody? And I helped create her. Ivanka. My daughter, Ivanka. She’s 6 feet tall, she’s got the best body. She made a lot money as a model—a tremendous amount," Trump said in 2003 on the Howard Stern Show. The video went viral as Trump faces a new allegation from former model Stacy Williams that he groped her at a party.
summary: ​“You know who’s one of the great beauties of the world, according to everybody? And I helped create her. Ivanka. My daughter, Ivanka. She’s 6 feet tall, she’s got the best body. She made a lot money as a model—a tremendous amount," Trump said in 2003 on the Howard Stern Show. The video went viral as Trump faces a new allegation from former model Stacy Williams that he groped her at a party.

title: Watch: Tucker Carlson's weird rant, 'Daddy Donald Trump will give spanking'
content: Tucker Carlson, speaking at a Georgia rally for Donald Trump, likened Trump's potential victory to a father's return to home to discipline truant kids. Carlson said when Dad Trump comes home, he's pissed but "not vengeful" and "loves his children, disobedient as they may be". The father figure would need to let the child (country) know that he's very disappointed in their behavior.
summary: Tucker Carlson, speaking at a Georgia rally for Donald Trump, likened Trump's potential victory to a father's return to home to discipline truant kids. Carlson said when Dad Trump comes home, he's pissed but "not vengeful" and "loves his children, disobedient as they may be". The father figure would need to let the child (country) know that he's very disappointed in their behavior.

title: United Nations Day 2024: Celebrating UN Charter's legacy and global impact
Turkey continues airstrikes on Kurdish militant targets in Syria and Iraq
content: Turkey has conducted airstrikes on alleged Kurdish militant positions in Syria and Iraq after a deadly attack on a defense company in Ankara. The National Intelligence Organisation targeted strategic assets of the PKK and its affiliates, with over 30 sites, including military and infrastructure facilities, destroyed.
summary: Turkey has conducted airstrikes on alleged Kurdish militant positions in Syria and Iraq after a deadly attack on a defense company in Ankara. The National Intelligence Organisation targeted strategic assets of the PKK and its affiliates, with over 30 sites, including military and infrastructure facilities, destroyed.

title: Who is Pakistani model Roma Michael, who is facing backlash for walking the ramp in a bikini?
content: Pakistani model Roma Michael sparked controversy after walking the ramp in a bikini and without a hijab at Miss Grand International 2024 in Thailand, leading to heavy backlash and the subsequent removal of the video. This incident highlights cultural tensions regarding women's clothing in Pakistan and has ignited debates on social media.
summary: Pakistani model Roma Michael sparked controversy after walking the ramp in a bikini and without a hijab at Miss Grand International 2024 in Thailand, leading to heavy backlash and the subsequent removal of the video. This incident highlights cultural tensions regarding women's clothing in Pakistan and has ignited debates on social media.

title: Eigth-month old found alive in coffin, declared dead once again upon reaching hospital
content: An eight-month-old girl in Brazil was declared dead, only for mourners to discover she was alive during her funeral. Despite resuscitation efforts after noticing her hand move, she was pronounced dead again shortly after being rushed back to the hospital. Authorities have promised a full investigation into the hospital's handling of her case.
summary: An eight-month-old girl in Brazil was declared dead, only for mourners to discover she was alive during her funeral. Despite resuscitation efforts after noticing her hand move, she was pronounced dead again shortly after being rushed back to the hospital. Authorities have promised a full investigation into the hospital's handling of her case.

title: Security forces kill 9 militants in northwest Pakistan
content: In a late-night intelligence-based operation in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa's Bajaur district, Pakistani security forces neutralized nine terrorists, including two suicide bombers and a high-value target involved in multiple attacks. They also seized large caches of weapons, ammunition, and explosives, underscoring the region's ongoing security challenges.
summary: In a late-night intelligence-based operation in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa's Bajaur district, Pakistani security forces neutralized nine terrorists, including two suicide bombers and a high-value target involved in multiple attacks. They also seized large caches of weapons, ammunition, and explosives, underscoring the region's ongoing security challenges.

title: JK Rowling’s sarcastic take on unpublished study on puberty blockers
content: JK Rowling criticized the delay in publishing a US study on puberty blockers for transgender youth, emphasizing concerns that withholding information due to political pressures harms children. The study, led by Dr. Johanna Olson-Kennedy, found no significant mental health improvements from these treatments.
summary: JK Rowling criticized the delay in publishing a US study on puberty blockers for transgender youth, emphasizing concerns that withholding information due to political pressures harms children. The study, led by Dr. Johanna Olson-Kennedy, found no significant mental health improvements from these treatments.

title: Justin Trudeau's own party pressuring him to step down, sets deadline
content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau faces a significant internal challenge as fellow party members urged him to consider resignation during a private Liberal caucus meeting. A critical document and a letter signed by two dozen MPs highlight growing concerns over the party's declining poll numbers and upcoming election prospects.
summary: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau faces a significant internal challenge as fellow party members urged him to consider resignation during a private Liberal caucus meeting. A critical document and a letter signed by two dozen MPs highlight growing concerns over the party's declining poll numbers and upcoming election prospects.

title: Blinken heads to Hamas mediator Qatar on Gaza truce push
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken heads Thursday to key Hamas mediator Qatar as he seeks momentum to end the Gaza war following Israel's killing of the group's leader. Blinken is also looking for greater clarity on a plan for reconstruction and post-war governance of Gaza, seeing it as a vital component to efforts to end the war.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken heads Thursday to key Hamas mediator Qatar as he seeks momentum to end the Gaza war following Israel's killing of the group's leader. Blinken is also looking for greater clarity on a plan for reconstruction and post-war governance of Gaza, seeing it as a vital component to efforts to end the war.

title: China blockade would be an act of war: Taiwan
content: China's blockaded Taiwan would be considered an act of war according to Taiwan's defense minister, Wellington Koo. This would affect international freight routes significantly. Despite concluding recent war games, Chinese military operations continue, prompting Taiwan’s defense response policy to remain firm against potential provocations by China's coast guard.
summary: China's blockaded Taiwan would be considered an act of war according to Taiwan's defense minister, Wellington Koo. This would affect international freight routes significantly. Despite concluding recent war games, Chinese military operations continue, prompting Taiwan’s defense response policy to remain firm against potential provocations by China's coast guard.

title: Georgia state fends off cyberattack on absentee ballot website, state secretary office reveals
content: Georgia's secretary of state’s office has successfully stopped a cyberattack suspected to be from a foreign entity, targeting the absentee ballot request website. The attempt aimed to crash the system before the presidential election. Despite the attack, the site remained operational, thanks to robust cyber defenses.
summary: Georgia's secretary of state’s office has successfully stopped a cyberattack suspected to be from a foreign entity, targeting the absentee ballot request website. The attempt aimed to crash the system before the presidential election. Despite the attack, the site remained operational, thanks to robust cyber defenses.
